group_1.textLeft: I feel guilty that you came all this way just to @watch me practicing alone.

group_1.textRight: No, it's fine! I had a feeling you’d be here, @so I wanted to check up on you.

group_1.textLeft: It's...not my phone. It must be yours.

group_1.textRight: Oh, erm... It'll be fine!
Anyway, here's some tea if you'd like.

group_1.textLeft: ...Does this have honey and lemon in it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, both are good for relieving fatigue. Acting @can take on a bigger toll than you'd think...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you. I'll give it a try.
...Mmm. It's wonderful.

group_1.textRight: I'm pleased to hear that!

group_1.textLeft: Did you make this at home?

group_1.textRight: No, I wasn't the one—
Oh...erm, no! @I mean, yes, it's homemade!

group_1.textLeft: That's your phone again.

group_1.textRight: I-it's fine, really! Nothing to worry about!

group_1.textLeft: Are you sure?

group_1.textRight: Yes...! I have a friend who's always fretting @over me.
Speaking of which...are you waiting to hear @from someone, too?

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: You've been keeping an eye on your phone.

group_1.textLeft: ...I tried apologizing to Ria.
But she won’t answer my calls, and hasn't @responded to my messages.
I've really made her mad.

group_1.textRight: Well... I think Ria has a lot she needs to @think about.
But I think that's because she expects great @things from you.
I mean it, though.

group_1.textLeft: No, I don't think you're lying.
(It seems like she cared about me a lot...)
...I think you should take a look at those @messages. They may be urgent.

group_1.textRight: Oh, no...it really is fine. @I know what it's about.

group_1.textLeft: If you're concerned about offending me, @there's no need.
Go ahead and check your phone. I'll be doing @some research in the meantime.

group_1.textRight: Research? What for?

group_1.textLeft: I'm looking into Tsuyu as a historical figure.
I thought it might help me better understand @her thoughts and feelings.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see!

group_1.textLeft: I haven't found any leads yet, though.
I visited the university library, but to no avail.
I'll try the library in Chuo Ward next.

group_1.textRight: If you're doing that, why not drop by the @Mizuna Art Museum?
They have materials related to the legend.

group_1.textLeft: What? Really?!

group_1.textRight: It's going to be a part of their special @Tanabata-related exhibition.

group_1.textLeft: I didn't even realize that was happening... @How did you know?

group_1.textRight: I work part-time at the museum, you see.
It's also been announced on the museum's @website.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
Still, you said "going to be" just then... @That means the items aren't on display yet?

group_1.textRight: That's true, they aren't...
But if you explain the situation to the museum @director, he'll let you see them.
Especially considering he's an extra @in the drama.
Would you like to stop by?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...! I'd love to!
